sentences.en: ‘Might be best to check.’ ‘Righty-ho, will do.’.
sentences.cn: “最好检查一下。”“行，好的。”。

sentences.en: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.cn: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.en: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.cn: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

sentences.en: Children sometimes have strong wills.
sentences.cn: 小孩子有时有很强的意志力。

sentences.en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentences.cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentences.en: He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他因有外遇而要面临纪律听证会的裁决。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.cn: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: I'm sure we will find a wide variety of choices available in school cafeterias.
sentences.cn: 我相信我们将会发现学校的自助餐厅里有多种多样的选择。

sentences.en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentences.cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentences.en: imagine, if you will, a typical silversmith's shop.
sentences.cn: 如果你愿意的话，想象一下吧，一个典型的银匠铺子。

sentences.en: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.cn: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.en: Over a given period, the value of shares will rise and fall.
sentences.cn: 股票的价值在某一特定的时期内会有涨跌。

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.cn: 批评的声音不会阻止人们涌到影院观看这部电影。

sentences.en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentences.en: The ship will not be ready for a month.
sentences.cn: 这艘船一个月内将不会准备就绪。

sentences.en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentences.cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: Three hundred million dollars will be nothing like enough.
sentences.cn: 3亿美元远远不够。

sentences.en: What time will she arrive?
sentences.cn: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

sentences.en: Will you ever feel at home here?
sentences.cn: 你在这儿会感到自在吗？

sentences.en: You will need a pot of broth for poaching.
sentences.cn: 你需要一锅汤来煮。

sentences.en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentences.cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

words.tran_cn: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

phrases.tran_cn: 恰在或当一个人希望的时候

phrases.phrase: have a will of one's own

phrases.tran_cn: 坚强的意志；强烈意愿；战胜自我

phrases.phrase: where there's a will there's a way

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［表示愿意遵照他人的请求、建议去做］行，好的
n. 意志力；毅力；自制力

phrases.phrase: with the best will in the world
phrases.tran_cn: 不管用意是多么的好（用于暗示不管多渴望，还是不能成功）

trans.tran_cn: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕

trans.tran_en: determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult
used to show that someone is willing or ready to do something
You use will to indicate that you hope, think, or have evidence that something is going to happen or be the case in the future
to try to make something happen by thinking about it very hard
